######## Question 8

The next step in our analysis is exploring some correlations in the data set First, the relationship between the length and width of the sepals, which is moderately negative with a magnitude of `r round(cor(iris$Sepal.Length, iris$Sepal.Width),2)`. On the other hand, between the length and width of the petals there is a strong  positive correlation ( r = `r round(cor(iris$Petal.Length, iris$Petal.Width), 2)`).
